import React,{Component} from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; export const Machine = () => { const { id } = useParams(); this.state = { machines: [], modalTitle: "", MachineId: 0, MachineName: "", MachineClass: "", MachineCompany: "", MachineState: "", MachineIdFilter: "", MachineNameFilter: "", MachineClassFilter: "", MachineStateFilter: "", MachinesWithoutFilter: [] } fetch(`https://wrk.acronex.com/api/challenge/machines/${id}`) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { this.setState({ machines: data}); }); return(
